title: The Lighthouse Cats of Mazatl√°n
description: Ana and Luna hike the lighthouse trail each day to visit and take care of their friends, the cats that are abandoned there. Their favorite is a little white cat named Wednesday. One day when a big storm rolls in from the ocean and the whole city shuts down, but what about Wednesday! Where are the Lighthouse Cats? Did they survive the storm?
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
